items.translated_title: CES 2026: Everything revealed, from Nvidia’s debuts to AMD’s new chips to Razer’s AI oddities
items.content: CES 2026 is in full swing in Las Vegas, with the show floor open to the public after a packed couple of days occupied by press conferences from the likes of Nvidia, Sony, and AMD and previews from Sunday’s Unveiled event.

items.translated_title: Governments grapple with the flood of non-consensual nudity on X
items.content: For the past two weeks, X has been flooded with AI-manipulated nude images, created by the Grok AI chatbot — and governments around the world are promising to take action.

items.translated_title: GTMfund has rewritten the distribution playbook for the AI era
items.content: Building software products has never been easier, so why are so many well-funded startups failing to take off no matter how good their product is? In this season finale episode of Build Mode, our guest has an answer: Startups have focused too much on product development and not enough on distribution excellence. Paul Irving is partner and […]

items.translated_title: Critics pan spyware maker NSO’s transparency claims amid its push to enter US market

items.title: EverNitro is simplifying the process of crafting silky nitro coffee at CES 2026
items.creator: Lauren Forristal
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: EverNitro is simplifying the process of crafting silky nitro coffee at CES 2026
items.content: EverNitro is positioning itself against competitors such as NitroBrew as a long-term more affordable all-in-one solution. “We offer the quality of a commercial tap with the footprint of a coffee maker. While others sell you gas, we give you technology to harvest it for free,” founder and CEO Terry Tan said.

items.translated_title: I watched LG’s new home robot CLOid do laundry but I have questions
items.content: CES is always chock-full of robots, and this year electronics giant LG announced a new bot, dubbed CLOid, that it claims will revolutionize household chores (as in, you won't have to do them anymore).

items.title: Go-to-market strategies for an AI era

items.translated_title: Go-to-market strategies for an AI era
items.content: In the season finale of Build Mode, Isabelle Johannessen sits down with Paul Irving, partner and COO of GTMfund, to discuss go-to-market strategies for the AI era. Paul shares specific, actionable advice on how early-stage startups can win even when facing well-funded competitors who iterate at lightning speed. He also explains why distribution has become the final remaining moat when technical advantages disappear in months […]

items.title: Elon Musk’s lawsuit against OpenAI will face a jury in March
items.creator: Rebecca Bellan
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Elon Musk’s lawsuit against OpenAI will face a jury in March

images.alt: In this photo illustration, the logo of 'OpenAI' is displayed on a mobile phone screen in front of a computer screen displaying the photograph of Elon Musk.

items.content: District Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers said there was evidence suggesting OpenAI’s leaders made assurances that its original nonprofit structure would be maintained. The case will go to trial in March.

items.translated_title: Hands-on with a prototype of Clicks’ Communicator, a new BlackBerry-like smartphone

images.alt: a photo showing the Clicks Communicator device, with an orange shell and a red lit-up notification button on the side.
a photo showing TechCrunch holding a green Clicks Communicator device, featuring its red lit-up notification button on the side of the device.

a screenshot showing a close-up of the lit-up button on the side of the Clicks Communicator. it's featuring a red lit-up button to show messages from certain people, and different colors for other people or types of messages that the user can prioritize.
a close-up photo showing the tactile physical keyboard on the Clicks Communicator device.

items.content: TechCrunch goes hands-on at the CES 2026 show with the new Clicks Communicator, a new Android smartphone with a physical keyboard.
